title: Can we have a simple way of getting BE in small quantities?
body:
Personally I have all champs but I feel extremely bad for new players.
 
Why don't we have something like a maximum of 10-20 BE per games played?
Or a repeatable quest that allows us to gain around 50 BE for the first win of the day?

Honestly I think of someone who wants champ so badly and they are 30 essence short, they have to get to the hassle of playing more game for another level with the champions that you forced onto them with the "lootbox" system that they have a chance of not disliking.

This system really benefits too much old players and just kinda stomps on the newer player.

This isn't to mention when you get a lootbox full of 90 BE champs.

replies.body:
thats easy.

give riot all your pocket money. If 14m kids do that world wide, they hit their Q3 profit targets.

There is another way to get Blue Essence right now,  but it is not as easy as you think, nor it is as difficult as it looks.
Project Missions, limited time only.
Once you complete a mission required to get the Project Missions icon (go to missions pane located on the bottom right corner next to the chat icon to see what is required to complete the mission to get the Project Missions icon).
Once you get the Project Missions icon, go to your loot, click on the Project Missions icon, and you will see Blue Essence.
Now complete missions to get tokens, and exchange the tokens for Blue Essence, 1 token gives you 20 Blue Essence.
However, I should point out that this way may not suit everyone, therefore I recommend you to use this way only if you are in desperate need of Blue Essence.

I also would like to point out that Riot has promised to have 50 Blue Essence after each First Win of the Day in patch 7.23, except that this remains to be seen in the near future, this feature isn't there yet.
